meanings.definition: A magazine containing news articles and features.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy reading the newsmagazine to stay updated on current events.
meanings.sent2: Every Sunday, I buy a newsmagazine to read about the latest news.
meanings.sent3: The newsmagazine had a funny cartoon on the front cover this week.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a newsmagazine, filled with stories waiting to be read.
meanings.sent5: The newsmagazine was a treasure trove of information, like a library in print.

meanings.definition: A publication that presents news in a magazine format.
meanings.sent1: The newsmagazine on the coffee table had colorful pictures and interesting stories.
meanings.sent2: My favorite newsmagazine always has a section on local events.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled coffee on the newsmagazine, creating a brown stain.
meanings.sent4: The newsmagazine was a window into the world, bringing global news to my doorstep.
meanings.sent5: As I flipped through the newsmagazine, I felt connected to the world beyond my town.
